sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_39b48ee673230300025780844ff6a7fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>ngBgSlideshow</name><script><![CDATA[function NgBgSlideshowDirective($interval) {
    return {
        restrict: 'A',
        scope: {
            ngBgSlideshow: '&',
            interval: '='
        },
        templateUrl: 'ngBgSlideshow-template',
        link: function (scope, elem, attrs) {
            scope.$watch('ngBgSlideshow', function (val) {
                scope.images = val();
                scope.active_image = 0;
            });

            var change = $interval(function () {
                scope.active_image++;
                if (scope.active_image >= scope.images.length)
                    scope.active_image = 0;
            }, scope.interval || 1000);

            scope.$on('$destroy', function () {
                $interval.cancel(change);
            });
        }
    };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-12 05:58:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>39b48ee673230300025780844ff6a7fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ngBgSlideshow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_39b48ee673230300025780844ff6a7fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-12 05:58:34</sys_updated_on><type>directive</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: c.slideshow-wrapper { padding: 80px 0; position: relative; background-color: transparent; // replace the standard bootstrap background color min-height: 100px; .slideshow { background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 50% 50%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; /* Layer the images so that the visible one is below all the others, * but the previously active one fades out to reveal the visible one * below */ transition: opacity 1s; opacity: 0; &.visible { transition: none; opacity: 1; z-index: -1; } } .inner-content { position: relative; } }slideshow_sp_instanceintervalfalsepe-background-slideshowfalsepe background slideshow[{"name":"embed_widget","label":"Embed Widget","type":"string"},{"hint":"ng-template or ui pages","name":"embed_template","label":"Embed Template","type":"string"}]truefalsesp_widgetadmin2018-01-12 05:16:00d9fab56673230300025780844ff6a7b018pe background slideshowglobalglobalsp_widget_d9fab56673230300025780844ff6a7b0admin2018-01-12 06:14:37
